QuestData.Title: Reawakening
QuestData.Description:
If you can retrieve my memories, I can help you. At least I believe I can.
Then, perhaps, we can help each other.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: One of the lieutenants of the Jailer, this creature keeps a dutiful eye over the Maw.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a stolen memory of the Runecarver.
QuestData.RewardText:
It's been an age since I knew anything other than the contours of this hellish prison.
Thank you, mortal. Now to aid you.

Objectives.Objective: Recover the Runecarver's memory from Odalrik
